briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of a registered class.
Initializes a new instance of a class.
Initializes a new instance of a class with a specific name.

detaileddescription.para:
Do not call this function. Use the XSFOUNDATION_END() macro instead.
void

briefdescription.para: Gets the class structure for a specific type ID.

simplesect.para: The class corresponding to the type ID

briefdescription.para: Gets the class for an object.
Gets the type ID for a specific class.

simplesect.para: The class ID of the class

briefdescription.para: Gets the class name for an object.
Gets the class name for an object.
Gets the class name for an object.
Gets the class type ID for an object.

simplesect.para: The class ID for the object

detaileddescription.para:
Do not call this function. Use the XSFOUNDATION_START() macro instead.
void

briefdescription.para: Checks whether a pointer is an object instance.

simplesect.para: True if the pointer represents an instance, otherwise false

briefdescription.para: Checks whether an object is an instance of a class.

simplesect.para: True if the object is an instance of the class, otherwise false

briefdescription.para: Checks whether an object is an instance of a class name.

simplesect.para: True if the object is an instance of the class name, otherwise false

briefdescription.para: Registers a class for the runtime.

detaileddescription.para:
All runtime classes needs to be registered before the runtime can use them and create instances. This function needs to be called once per class, ie using pthread_once().
cls
The class structure to register
The runtime type ID for the class
